lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Baker also said that after meeting Japanese special envy Shintaro Abe, "it's clear that Japan intends to take strong steps to stimulate its economy to meet its committments under the Louvre Accord."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Let me emphasize that all seven major industrial nations remain fully committed to strengthening policy coordination, promoting growth and cooperating to foster stability of exchange rates," he told the American Enterprise Institute.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Substantial exchange rate adjustments have also been accomplished over the past two years so that today we are better positioned to promote growth and reduce external imbalances," he said.
